de.unlixx.runpng.util

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<V>
      • javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Integer>
        • de.unlixx.runpng.util.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Integer>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Integer>, javafx.concurrent.Worker<java.lang.Integer>, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Player
extends javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Integer>
    Implementation of a Player derived from the abstract Task class. This is used to run a timed image sequence.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface javafx.concurrent.Worker
